SAY - New York - Full Time - ONSITE - www.say.com

SAY’s mission is simple: To fix a broken system. We make the complex process of shareholder voting more accessible for all investors -- not just the biggest and most powerful. SAY enables investors to use their voices and vote, connecting them to the corporations they have shares in. We’re giving a voice to the growing world of everyday investors. Come add yours.

Our product is live! During the Tesla earnings call, Elon answered five questions submitted on our platform by everyday investors. Check out product in action: https://say.com/earnings
